alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, central Lexington and central Richland Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over South Congaree, or near Springdale, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Springdale, St. Andrews, Red Bank, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Hopkins, Harbison State Forest, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk and Five Points. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 49 and 67. Interstate 26 between mile markers 104 and 123. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
